org.codeoverflow.chatoverflow.api.io.dto.chat.discord

Class DiscordEmbed.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codeoverflow.chatoverflow.api.io.dto.chat.discord.DiscordEmbed.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    DiscordEmbed

    public static class DiscordEmbed.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class that simplifies the creation of your own embeds

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DiscordEmbed build()
      Creates a new embed from this builder.
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withAuthor(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name and the url of the embed author, displayed in bold in the first line of the embed
      If this is not set, the author will not appear in the embed.
      Use withAuthor(String, String) to also set the authors url
      Use withAuthor(String, String, String) to also set the authors url and avatar
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withAuthor(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String url)
      Sets the name and the url of the embed author, displayed in bold in the first line of the embed
      If this is not set, the author will not appear in the embed.
      Use withAuthor(String, String, String) to also set the authors avatar
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withAuthor(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String url, java.lang.String iconUrl)
      Sets the name, the url and the avatar of the embed author, displayed in bold in the first line of the embed
      If this is not set, the author will not appear in the embed.
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withColor(java.awt.Color color)
      Sets the color of the embed.
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withColor(java.lang.String color)
      Sets the color of the embed.
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withDescription(java.lang.String description)
      Sets the description of the embed.
      If this is not set, the description will not appear in the embed.
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withDescription(java.lang.StringBuilder description)
      Sets the description of the embed.
      If this is not set, the description will not appear in the embed.
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withField(DiscordEmbed.Field field)
      Adds a DiscordEmbed.Field to this embed.
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withFooter(java.lang.String text)
      Sets the footer of the embed.
      If this is not set, the footer will not appear in the embed.
      Use withTitle(String, String) if you want to display a small icon inside the footer
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withFooter(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String iconUrl)
      Sets the footer of the embed.
      If this is not set, the footer will not appear in the embed.
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withImage(java.lang.String imageUrl)
      Sets the large image that is displayed inside the embed
      If this is not set, the image will not appear in the embed.
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withThumbnail(java.lang.String thumbnailUrl)
      Sets the thumbnail of the embed.
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withTimestamp(java.time.OffsetDateTime time)
      Sets the time of the embed.
      If this is not set, the time will not appear in the embed.
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withTitle(java.lang.String title)
      Sets the title of the embed.
      If this is not set, the title will not appear in the embed.
      Use withTitle(String, String) if you want it to be a hyperlink
      DiscordEmbed.Builder withTitle(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String url)
      Sets the title of the embed and makes it into a hyperlink pointed at this url.
      If this is not set, the description will not appear in the embed.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public Builder()

    • Method Detail

      • withTitle

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Sets the title of the embed.
        If this is not set, the title will not appear in the embed.
        Use withTitle(String, String) if you want it to be a hyperlink
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the embed
        Returns:
        the builder after the title has been set

      • withTitle

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withTitle(java.lang.String title,
                                      java.lang.String url)
        Sets the title of the embed and makes it into a hyperlink pointed at this url.
        If this is not set, the description will not appear in the embed.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the embed
        url - the url to which the tile links
        Returns:
        the builder after the title has been set

      • withDescription

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withDescription(java.lang.String description)
        Sets the description of the embed.
        If this is not set, the description will not appear in the embed. This is where the main text for an embed is typically placed.
        Parameters:
        description - the description of the embed
        Returns:
        the builder after the description has been set

      • withDescription

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withDescription(java.lang.StringBuilder description)
        Sets the description of the embed.
        If this is not set, the description will not appear in the embed. This is where the main text for an embed is typically placed.
        This method allows modifying the description by appending to the string builder till build() is called
        Parameters:
        description - a string builder used to build the description of the event
        Returns:
        the builder after the description has been set

      • withColor

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withColor(java.lang.String color)
        Sets the color of the embed.
        Parameters:
        color - the color of the embed, as hex string starting with a #
        Returns:
        the builder after the color has been set

      • withColor

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withColor(java.awt.Color color)
        Sets the color of the embed.
        Parameters:
        color - the color of the embed
        Returns:
        the builder after the color has been set

      • withTimestamp

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withTimestamp(java.time.OffsetDateTime time)
        Sets the time of the embed.
        If this is not set, the time will not appear in the embed.

        Tip:
        Get the current time with OffsetDateTime.now()

        Parameters:
        time - the time of the embed (value in epoch millis)
        Returns:
        the builder after the time has been set

      • withFooter

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withFooter(java.lang.String text)
        Sets the footer of the embed.
        If this is not set, the footer will not appear in the embed.
        Use withTitle(String, String) if you want to display a small icon inside the footer
        Parameters:
        text - the text of the footer of the embed.
        Returns:
        the builder after the footer has been set

      • withFooter

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withFooter(java.lang.String text,
                                       java.lang.String iconUrl)
        Sets the footer of the embed.
        If this is not set, the footer will not appear in the embed.
        Parameters:
        text - the text of the footer of the embed.
        iconUrl - the url of the icon that should be displayed in the footer
        Returns:
        the builder after the footer has been set

      • withThumbnail

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withThumbnail(java.lang.String thumbnailUrl)
        Sets the thumbnail of the embed. (the image that is displayed in the upper right corner of the embed)
        If this is not set, the thumbnail will not appear in the embed.
        Parameters:
        thumbnailUrl - the url of the thumbnail
        Returns:
        the builder after the thumbnail has been set

      • withImage

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withImage(java.lang.String imageUrl)
        Sets the large image that is displayed inside the embed
        If this is not set, the image will not appear in the embed.
        Parameters:
        imageUrl - the url of the image
        Returns:
        the builder after the image has been set

      • withAuthor

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withAuthor(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name and the url of the embed author, displayed in bold in the first line of the embed
        If this is not set, the author will not appear in the embed.
        Use withAuthor(String, String) to also set the authors url
        Use withAuthor(String, String, String) to also set the authors url and avatar
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the author
        Returns:
        the builder after the author has been set

      • withAuthor

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withAuthor(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String url)
        Sets the name and the url of the embed author, displayed in bold in the first line of the embed
        If this is not set, the author will not appear in the embed.
        Use withAuthor(String, String, String) to also set the authors avatar
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the author
        url - the url of the author of the embed
        Returns:
        the builder after the author has been set

      • withAuthor

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withAuthor(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String url,
                                       java.lang.String iconUrl)
        Sets the name, the url and the avatar of the embed author, displayed in bold in the first line of the embed
        If this is not set, the author will not appear in the embed.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the author
        url - the url of the author of the embed
        iconUrl - the url of the icon for the author
        Returns:
        the builder after the author has been set

        public DiscordEmbed.Builder withField(DiscordEmbed.Field field)
        Adds a DiscordEmbed.Field to this embed.

        Returns:
        the builder after the field has been added
